p: The most significant decrease of arrivals of patients at the HCN was recorded during the 13th, 14th and 15th pandemic week. It was influenced by the developed modules which were distributed to the HCN as they were developed and adapted. The greatest decrease so far was recorded in the 14th week of 2020 ( Figs. 5, 6). During the 13th pandemic week the integration with COVID-19 IS was completed so patients started to significantly communicate online with chosen physicians. At the same time, the number of their arrivals at the HCN decreased, which means that contacts and the stay in the environment with high virus presence incidence were reduced.
